snippet: A new film and biography delve into the private life of J. D. Salinger. Francine Prose and Dana Stevens address whether people are more fascinated by the man or his books.
abstract: Author Francine Prose and critic Dana Stevens reflect on whether people are more fascinated by J D Salinger than his work, in light of new film and biography that delve into Salinger's private life.
lead_paragraph: A new film and biography delve into the private life of J. D. Salinger. Francine Prose and Dana Stevens address whether people are more fascinated by the man or his books.

headline.main: Salinger’s Big Appeal: The Life or the Work?
headline.print_headline:
A new film and biography delve into the private life of J. D. Salinger.
Are people more fascinated by the man than by his work?
